thread.title: Tell Us Your Best, Worst, Or Most Embarrassing Encounter With A Bollywood Celebrity
thread.title_full: Tell Us Your Best, Worst, Or Most Embarrassing Encounter With A Bollywood Celebrity

author: Andre Borges
title: Tell Us Your Best, Worst, Or Most Embarrassing Encounter With A Bollywood Celebrity
text:
View this image › 
pinkvilla.com ID: 10762676 2. And the encounters can be exciting, worrisome, and at times, even super embarrassing… View this image › 
AIB ID: 10762699 3. Have you ever had an inspiring life changing encounter? View this image › 
Shahid Kamal Ahmad ID: 10762857 4. Or has a celeb ever helped you out, reached out to you in anyway? View this image › 
twitter.com ID: 10762935 5. Or do you have any stories of college days, of early days of working with stars, of times before they were rich and famous and on every billboard? View this image › 
missmalini.com ID: 10762757 6. We’d love to hear about all your heartwarming, inspiring, and embarrassing encounters with Bollywood celebrities. Tell us all about it in the comments, and your story could be featured in a BuzzFeed post! ID: 10762875 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
